author: gdaniels
msg: Various improvements made at soapbuilders meeting.
Add support for XML config file pointing to endpoints,
Add implementation of XMLP-10 (commented right now since
I've got a server implementation for this stuff as well,
which I'll check in tomorrow (and remove the one that
Throw a DataEncodingUnknown fault if, when deserializing,
Changed to support throwing AxisFault for the
Support SOAP 1.2 GET requests.  Uses "?method=" style
URLs to do dispatch at the moment, and creates
"empty" SOAP envelopes to send down into the service.
TODO: add per-operation configuration of this being
Return a 400 if it's a SOAP 1.2 "Sender" fault
Only put SOAP 1.2 result tag in if RPC style.
Allow a config option to accept missing parameters or
Send SOAP 1.2 BadArguments fault when appropriate
Add setValue(), toString(), and equals() so these
classes can be deserialized into, compared, and
Flesh out some tests (still needs more work)
